elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Determine which assessment criterion is used as the primary argument in each case.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: The EU should regulate which countries take in how many refugees according to their size. It would be unfair if some countries had to take in proportionately more refugees than others.
choices: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Vocational training should be regulated by the individual countries themselves. This is the only way that the companies based there can have a say.
choices: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)
correctAnswer: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Language courses for young people should be organized by the EU so that the same quality standards apply to all offers.
choices: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)

elements.title: Determine which assessment criterion is used as the primary argument in each case.

correctAnswer: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)

elements.name: Frage 5

choices: Consideration of regional characteristics and proximity to citizens (citizen-oriented problem solving)
